=> Friday, 16 August 2019 20.52.04
Testing Persistence Module, inserting an entity, it fails with :
[default-akka.actor.default-dispatcher-5] ERROR app.server.httpServer.persistence.persistentActor.AppPersistentActor - Persistence failure when replaying events for persistenceId [one_and_only_parsistent_actor]. Last known sequence number [0] java.io.InvalidClassException: app.server.httpServer.persistence.persistentActor.PersistentActorCommands$InsertNewEntityCommand; local class incompatible: stream classdesc serialVersionUID = 8383394163303651159, local class serialVersionUID = -2875643574538822665 at java.io.ObjectStreamClass.initNonProxy(ObjectStreamClass.java:699)
